name: Mark L. HELPIN, Respondent v. TRUSTEES OF the UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA, Marjorie Jeffcoat, Thomas Freitag, and Lawrence M. Levin, Petition of Trustees of the University of Pennsylvania
name_abbreviation: Helpin v. Trustees of the University

parties: Mark L. HELPIN, Respondent v. TRUSTEES OF the UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA, Marjorie Jeffcoat, Thomas Freitag, and Lawrence M. Levin, Petition of Trustees of the University of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of September, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the following question:
Should damages for future income that would have been calculated as part of a business’s profits be discounted to present value?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
981 A.2d 1280
Mark L. HELPIN, Respondent v. TRUSTEES OF the UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA, Marjorie Jeffcoat, Thomas Freitag, and Lawrence M. Levin, Petition of Trustees of the University of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 15, 2009.
